trans-unit.source: Wraps remoting data for passing between message sinks, either for requests from client to server or for the subsequent responses.
trans-unit.target: Bryter ekstern kommunikasjon-data for sending mellom meldingen mottakere, enten for forespørsler fra klienten til serveren eller etterfølgende svar.

trans-unit.source: The InternalMessageWrapper class is the base class for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes, which wrap messages for method calls on remote objects.
trans-unit.target: Klassen InternalMessageWrapper er basisklasse for den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>og <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper>klassene som bryte meldinger for metodekall for eksterne objekter.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>

trans-unit.source: InternalMessageWrapper is used by the infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: InternalMessageWrapper brukes av infrastruktur av .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create instances of the InternalMessageWrapper, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>, and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å opprette forekomster av InternalMessageWrapper, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>, og <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper>klasser direkte.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>klassen brukes av ekstern kommunikasjon infrastruktur av .NET Framework.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> directly.
trans-unit.target: Du trenger ikke å opprette en <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>direkte.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> parameter also implements the derived interface, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>, which indicates that the message acts as a request or as a response on a remote method call.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>parameteren også implementerer grensesnittet avledede <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>, noe som angir at meldingen fungerer som en forespørsel, eller som svar på en ekstern metodekallet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interfaces, in turn, inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>og <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage>grensesnitt, i sin tur arve fra den <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage>

trans-unit.source: A message that acts either as an outgoing method call on a remote object, or as the subsequent response.
trans-unit.target: En melding som fungerer som et utgående metodekall på et eksternt objekt, eller etterfølgende svaret.

trans-unit.source: Represents the request or response <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage"></xref> interface that is wrapped by the message wrapper.
trans-unit.target: Representerer forespørselen eller svar <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage"> </xref> grensesnittet brytes av wrapper for meldingen.
